isEmail: {property} should be a valid email address.
isBoolean: {property} should be a valid boolean value.
isEnum: {property} should be a valid enum values {enum}.
isNotEmptyArray: {property} should not be an empty array.
minLength: {property} should have a minimum length of {min}.
maxLength: {property} should have a maximum length of {max}.
isMobilePhone: {property} should be a valid mobile phone number.
isMongoId: {property} should be a valid MongoDB ObjectID.
passwordComplexity: {property} must contain at least one lowercase letter and one numeric digit.
isObject: {property} message should be an object with valid keys.
